title: 4-year-old grazed in shooting
content:
MEMPHIS, TN (WMC) -
A four year old was caught in the middle of gunfire.
Police said the child was grazed by a bullet Saturday on West Essex Avenue near Arkansas Street.
The child was taken to Le Bonheur, but is expected to be okay.
It’s not clear who fired the gun at this time.
